.news-author-date{color:#838d9c;font-size:.8125rem;display:block;padding-top:.625rem;line-height:1.125rem}.homepage .list-news .news-author-date.fix-bottom{padding-top:1.25rem}.homepage .list-news .row .link-block{border-top:.0625rem solid #e6e6e6;padding-top:.625rem;padding-bottom:.625rem;text-align:left}.homepage .auto-promo{text-align:center;padding-top:.9375rem;padding-bottom:.9375rem}@media print,screen and (min-width:40em){.homepage .custom-offers .offer,.homepage .top-offers .offer,.homepage .top5 .offer{transition:all .2s ease-out;border-radius:.125rem}.homepage .title-h2{font-size:1.875rem;line-height:2.3125rem}.homepage .top-offers{margin:0 auto;padding-left:.9375rem;padding-top:.9375rem;width:62.5rem}.homepage .top-offers .offer{margin-right:1.875rem;position:relative;-webkit-transform:translateY(0);transform:translateY(0)}.homepage .top-offers .offer:hover{-webkit-transform:translateY(-2px);transform:translateY(-2px);box-shadow:0 .0625rem .25rem 0 rgba(10,10,10,.08)}.homepage .top-offers .offer:last-of-type{margin-right:.9375rem}.homepage .top-offers .offer .offer-info{padding:.9375rem}.homepage .top-offers .offer .offer-info .merchant-img{height:62px;width:93px}.homepage .top-offers .offer .offer-info .merchant-title{padding-top:0;width:170px}.homepage .top5{padding:1.875rem .46875rem 1.25rem}.homepage .top5>.columns{padding:0 .46875rem}.homepage .top5 .offer{overflow:hidden;display:block;-webkit-transform:translateY(0);transform:translateY(0)}.homepage .top5 .offer:hover{-webkit-transform:translateY(-2px);transform:translateY(-2px);box-shadow:0 .0625rem .25rem 0 rgba(10,10,10,.08)}.homepage .top5 .offer-info{padding:0 0 1.5625rem;border-bottom:0;text-align:center;background:#fefefe;margin-top:-.625rem;z-index:1;position:relative}.homepage .top5 .offer-info .merchant-img{float:none;margin-top:-1.875rem;display:inline-block;width:78px;height:52px}.homepage .title-block-offer{padding-top:1.25rem;padding-bottom:.625rem;font-size:1.375rem;line-height:1.6875rem}.homepage .last-coupon{padding-left:.9375rem;width:1000px}.homepage .last-coupon .block-offers{margin-right:1.875rem}.homepage .last-coupon .block-offers .offer{width:303px;transition:all .2s ease-out;-webkit-transform:translateY(0);transform:translateY(0);padding:1.1875rem auto;padding-left:.9375rem;padding-top:0}.homepage .custom-offers .offer{margin-right:1.875rem;overflow:hidden;position:relative;-webkit-transform:translateY(0);transform:translateY(0)}.homepage .custom-offers .offer:last-of-type{margin-right:.9375rem}.homepage .custom-offers .offer:hover{-webkit-transform:translateY(-2px);transform:translateY(-2px);box-shadow:0 .0625rem .25rem 0 rgba(10,10,10,.08)}.homepage .custom-offers .offer .offer-info{padding:1.1875rem .875rem}.homepage .custom-offers .offer .offer-info .merchant-img{height:52px;width:79px}.homepage .custom-offers .offer .offer-info .merchant-title{width:180px}.homepage .list-news .columns:last-of-type.news{padding-bottom:0}.homepage .list-news .news{padding-bottom:1.0625rem}.homepage .list-news .news-title{font-weight:700}.homepage .list-news .news-img{float:none;width:inherit;border-radius:.125rem;margin-bottom:.5rem}.homepage .list-news .news-author-date.fix-bottom{padding-top:.3125rem}.homepage .list-news+.row .link-block{border-top:.0625rem solid #e6e6e6;padding-top:.625rem}}@media print,screen and (min-width:66.25em){.homepage .custom-offers-wrap,.homepage .last-coupon-wrap,.homepage .top-offers-wrap{overflow-x:inherit}.homepage .last-coupon{display:-webkit-box;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;margin:0 auto}.homepage .last-coupon .block-offers .offer:hover{-webkit-transform:translateY(-2px);transform:translateY(-2px);box-shadow:0 .0625rem .25rem 0 rgba(10,10,10,.08)}}

   <style>
    .sticky-offer {
             background: #1ead12;
         }
 
         .sticky-offer:after {
             background: #000000;
         }
 
         .sticky-offer .merchand-offer {
             color: #ffffff;
             background: #000000;
         }
 
         .sticky-offer .merchand-offer:after {
             background: linear-gradient(110deg, #000000 50%,#1ead12 50%,#1ead12 100%);
         }
 
         .sticky-offer .title-offer {
             color: #ffffff;
         }
 
         .sticky-offer .link-offer {
             color: #ffffff;
         }
   </style>

           </span>
           <span class="offer-title">
            30% de remise sur la collection Printemps-Été 2018
           </span>
          </div>
         </a>
